title: Apple’s $1,599 Studio Display vs. Other Monitors: You Won’t Get What You Pay For
sub_head: The sharp new monitor makes a good case for people who are all in on Macs, but the screen doesn’t stand out against competitors and the webcam is bad
body:
People have two divergent reactions to Apple ’s new $1,599 Studio Display with a webcam and surround-sound speakers:
#1 Oh, awesome! Should I buy it?
